attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ronnie Biggs has served his time! and if we the public want him free because we dont feel he poses any fret to us why cant our opinons be listened to? He done the crime a very long time ago and has served the time for that. he is now a dying old man, who should have the right to live out his dying days or weeks with is family!

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
